messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Warning detected engineer running into your Super Matter you may wish to start the cooling loop before the delemation begins

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have eleminated your SM you may order another later have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Room.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: if you don't save ian we are nuking your shuttle

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: remeber what we said about ian... yeah

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: haha lol trolled heres the real bomb
